lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean it's a new day.

lines.text: Can I summon the sword and cast See Invisibility?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I can't imagine that half the people in this group don't have weird stuff like that.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other carpenter is Jester, so currently it's just Gallant

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They don't trust us. We know that, but if there is even a hair of doubt in their minds that perhaps their empire citizens feel the need to cooperate or feel--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm with it, it hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Think we're on the same page.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it'd be good if we all spoke together including anyone who is here who would be involved in deliberations.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In time, with the lady, but until we get to that point, I think just a general sync up on what we're going to be doing.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And how do you see us functioning into these?

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: "And this deliberation is to be helmed "by the emissary Lord Zeddan Graf himself, "I will be present for this "as well as a few designated "Righteous Brand elite soldiers "and they will have their dignitary "as well as protectors as well.

lines.text: "No, he is not part of this discussion."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As will you. That is your purpose here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What have you done to prepare?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But trust and be assured, I've taken precautions."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think perhaps something that would assuage our nerves in this endeavor is inspecting the beacon, as discussed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lady Vess speaks up and goes, "That is of course--" and Martinet put his hand up and says, "And you would wish to inspect right now?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we alone or are we being followed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They come together behind you guys and step to the top of the stairs, following you and then stopping at the top to just play vigil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're beautifully made, very elven in construct and they have a brass coil towards the edge of it.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lady Vess." Lady Vess goes ahead and lifts up a secondary cup and they both lift them over to you before pouring some of their own.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is truly a deck of many things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Single sweat drop just starts to go down Caleb's-- (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I taste anything off about the tea? Anything weird? Sense anything?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both campaigns, got you! Eventually, they both sit down and Lady Vess motions for you guys to take a seat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we see the beacon in this room with us already?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So how is it you will be a help to the negotiations in a few days, Lady DeRogna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But it is the beginning of a conversation."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the Martinet here in the room with us?

lines.name: MTAT
lines.text: Yes, the two of them are sitting at the table next to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They'll open that door for us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Didn't know if he left or not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have hopes, then, not just to end the war, but to create agreement and collaboration between the two nations.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it make for "a much more effective series of programs "to work together than against."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that have something to do with the potential work offerings that you mentioned to us before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the Martinet gives her a look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So if it is possible, and things go well, "then maybe there is work for you to do "at the behest of the Assembly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our calendar is a little full in the short term.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Going to be on the sea for a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Miss Lionett and I are very curious what your proclivities are? What you are trying to achieve or discover in the north?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, those would be on a need to know basis."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm looking at the Martinet, is he pissed? Is he intrigued?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's bringing these whispers to us< Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'll just say that it's sponsored--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "you're here for a reason." And he goes ahead and snap his fingers and on the floor next to him he watches an iridescent chest (poofing) appears in the space there, this slight drifting smoke around it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I tell from this distance if it's the one that we saw at Pride's Call?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The one that we know is lost.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it did you say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I recognize it? I know it's not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check as well, you guys can both roll.

lines.text: I would guide you, but you didn't take us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's fixing your ship right now.

lines.text: Not the one that we toted it around for a while.

lines.text: No, that one you gave to the Bright Queen, but this one is nearly identical to that one in the structure around it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lift it up, and set it down, there's little tables, tea tables?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And float there in the air.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauregard, will you have a look at this with me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to slowly take time to check it for anything hidden or affixed to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't appear to be altered in any way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's different because it is a unique beacon, but it is familiar to the one that you had lugged around for quite some time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't mind me and begin to go through the process of casting Detect Magic upon it.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like looking into the sun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And finally, I will place both my hands on it and stare into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to step in front and just not take my eyes off of the two of them while he takes a minute.

lines.text: I've seen her get in a dude's face before with that look, it's not pretty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's a story for another time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I commend you on letting go of it

lines.text: (as Ludinus) "It is important to keep things under control "and "hopefully without disrupting society."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am surprised you are able to let it go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Vess) "Well, it is not easy "by any means, but "it is just how things have to be."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seems like a missed opportunity for our home.

lines.name: MATT
